author: Steve Gibson
comment: From the side of a host...AirBnB is quirky. I receive instant book reservations after I knowingly shut I.B. OFF and a few other things. From the travel side, difficult to see distacne to unit you may be booking from area you desire to stay. ...often property is 50 miles from where you think you're booking. Need better location software.

author: lai emf
comment: Hell customer service. The host wanted to fully refund to me while i cancelled the booking, but couldn't changed the system of the refund policy if the booking was set. That's why I've asked for a supporter to interfered in. She told me to cancel the booking then help me for the refund. Eventually, i didn't even get my full refund because she couldn't reach the host over the issue. I've lost the 50% refund and the service fee,worse, i gotta to looking for a new room.

author: Filip Sobczak
comment: For a company that has great reputation in software developers community, the app is amazingly bugged and clunky. Chat seems to work intermittently, requiring the app to restart. Desktop app is so slow and lagging it makes me wonder, as I'm a dev myself, what possibly could go wrong there. Doesn't anyone do performance profiling?

author: Wee Kiat Lau
comment: Norton Security has flagged some unusual behaviors in this app.  Why are you guys sharing my information to an unknown location? Is this a bug or deliberate?  To be detailed: the app was flagged to contain intrusive ads, and auto-installing apps in the background.

author: Ezra De Beer
comment: Airbnb did my booking and took the payment immediately from my Credit Card but never finalised my booking due to my ID not being accepted as clear enough. I uploaded it 4 times and it was readable. Money still not refunded but booking cancelled. The other concern was that the money was taken from my account even before the booking was accepted by the host.

author: JIAQI LI
comment: I don't remember passports as only when i need to trip and need a stay I use this website. However, It always has to friendly block my account for this moment and therefore I have to spend my money on the alternative websites, always!   Very well designed. Haha

After my ID was accepted and my booking paid for, I received an email saying my ID was not clear and a refund would take 15 days. Customer support is useless and won't give a reason, or assist in verifying my ID. Very poor experience.

OMG I  think I would rather rip out my finger nails than try and book through AirBnB. Finding a device with a camera and a scanner attached! Come on! I just want to do a booking; not run for Prime Minister.

author: Martin Hahn
comment: It'd be nice if you can see if they are available for the dates you choose. Real time. I booked, submitted my credit card information like I was going to pay, owner replied. Sorry. This was my first Airbnb.

author: Ilias Tsafaras
comment: Great app. The cancellation policy is kind of fair but still, the strict ones (50% of money lost), when it comes to an accident for example or unexpected event, is not so good. Understandable but not good for the client.

author: Atul Vaid
comment: Photo scan and match with ID feature sucks big time. Unable to match my Id with photo 10 times.

author: AX BX
comment: Ridiculous email verification continuously fails with no workaround so can never complete my profile! Does anyone at Airbnb care? Of course they don't.

author: Ian Bland
comment: Pretty convenient. But, I learned from a property owner that the automatic pricing algorithm can stretch the limits of what people are willing to pay for a property. It seems that airbnb is greedier than the owners.

author: Alasdair Cameron
comment: Had 3 good experiences so far. There are some suspicious looking offers to avoid and you now have to give photo id which I have mixed feelings about

author: Michael Freed
comment: As a host, I encounter bugs constantly, and I lose a ton of revenue because the calendar doesn't work logically. But, it's the only game in town. I hope they improve the app.

author: Clifford Hutt
comment: This new ID requirement feature is BS and it only made me retake the stupid photo half a dozen times.
I love Airbnb.  My husband and I always use it when we travel and so far have never been disappointed.  The reviews are reliable and the hosts we have had so far have been amazing.  We are fans.

author: Kurman Курман
comment: After the last update, app is detected as unsecure and a virus by sberbank bank application. Unsecured payments etc.

author: Alannah Caldwell
comment: I'm not able to see when the remaining balance is due on the app nor on the desktop. There should be away where you can see it.

author: David Leiner
comment: it keeps crashing every time I try to access calender or reservations. They need to fix this asap. Otherwise it's good

author: singhshaddy
comment: The app is good, but their customer service needs more upgrading. They weren't there to help us when we really needed their help. It would have been 5 stars if your customer service is prompt in their service.

author: Kort Walsh
comment: Super duper. I'm going on the way from work now so I'm going on the phone to the shop tomorrow to see you before you get a new job.

author: Wan Wan Putra
comment: I can't change my payment currency, so I can't book the hotel, can you do something about it? I login use my Facebook ID. Thanks before..

author: Jeff Gagnon
comment: The Airbnb app is brilliant and by taking  the time to read the reviews, everyone knows what they are getting!

author: Steve Anderson
comment: All of our experience with Airbnb have been great. From searching, to our stays have been easy and fun.

author: Ivan Gonçalves de Castro Ferreira
comment: Airbnb is great but this app had big issues with paymment method register. Not too different from their web site.

author: Shay Pat
comment: Goes round the block a bit but seems fair!

author: Tim Austin
comment: Easy to use but did not like that I couldn't use Google Pay to do 2 payments (Half now/half later) even though Google Pay is linked to a credit card. Overall still like the App.
It's a fantastic alternative to a local hotels! Thank you for airbnb worldwide!

author: Gerry Knapp
comment: Easy to use app with convenient built-in messaging. Was very easy to book through the app, which is nice if you don't have a computer handy.

author: Chandra Achberger
comment: I've been a Super Host since 2016. Both as a host and and a guest I've always been happy with AirBnB and their ability to create an amazing product that makes a huge difference in so many families lives. Thank you AirBnB.

author: Andrea G
comment: It keeps freezing up or sending an error measage when I try to make a reservation or send a message to a host.

author: Kristopher Bryant
comment: Amazing service for all to use. I really like using this over big hotels because it puts money in the hands of people who need it, young startups that want to change the world around them.

author: James Chuda
comment: As a host when i am sending a message to my guest the key board covers the word send. Makes it difficult to send

author: Preyas Agarwal
comment: Unable to login...doesnt even shows any error message...waste of time

author: Shanessa Budhoo
comment: So far I had a great experience with my host and the app was really helpful to communicate effectively with the hosts. And search for the best place to suit my needs with the ability to view and compare prices.
Enjoyed the experience of app. Works just as good as website. Thanks!

author: cd newkirk
comment: Great app!  Who needs a hotel?!?  First time user, was able to compare prices and look at hosts/properties.  Able to connect with host effortlessly.  Will use all the time now!

author: Julio Cesar Garcia Medina
comment: Since last update I can't log in, already uninstall and re install 2 times but still nothing..  I'll change to 5-stars when I'm able to use it

author: Ryan Kimball
comment: I absolutely would never ever consider going back to hotels. Only way to travel.
